about_the_game:
Welcome to Purrrifiers, the ultimate coop cleaning and chaos experience! Gather your friends for a hilarious and absurd adventure in a world filled with references to pop culture and other games. Whether you're solving puzzles, driving quirky vehicles, or interacting with the environment, every moment promises fun and excitement.

GAME FEATURES:


  • Multiplayer Madness: Team up with up to 4 players in cooperative and competition modes.
  • Diverse Gameplay Modes: Enjoy a rich campaign mode, solo adventures, and various multiplayer options.
  • Interactive World: Engage with RAGDOLL characters, explore dynamic environments, and create your own chaos.
  • Upgrade & Customize: Level up your character, expand your business, and unlock new costumes, tools, and stickers.
  • Cat Companions: Befriend and pet cats that assist you throughout your journey.

ACTIVITIES


  • Solve puzzles to access and clean different locations.
  • Clean, collect, and sort garbage.
  • Drive various vehicles like garbage trucks, lawn mowers, street sweepers, boats, and drones.
  • Utilize a wide array of cleaning tools from pressure washers to vacuum cleaners and stun guns.

VEHICLES


  • Garbage Trucks: Collect and recycle waste.
  • Lawn Mowers: Enjoy relaxing lawn mowing sessions.
  • Street Sweepers: Compete in cleaning streets.
  • Specialized Boats: Clean water bodies like Pac-Man.
  • Drones: Navigate through foggy areas with precision.

TOOLS


  • Pressure washers, sponges, vacuum cleaners, and more.
  • Unique tools like stun guns and shredders.
  • Various chemicals and cleaning equipment.
  • Cats that help you clean in ingenious ways.

LOCATIONS


Explore diverse areas including suburbs, towns, landfills, cinemas, forests, beaches, and more.
Each location offers unique challenges and hidden cats to find.

Micro and Macro Cleaning:


Tackle both large-scale neighborhood cleanups and detailed cleaning in individual buildings.
Collaborate with your team, divide tasks, and watch out for quirky customers.



JOIN THE FUN!

Immerse yourself in the whimsical world of Purrrifiers where cleaning meets chaos, and every action is an opportunity for laughter and fun. Grab your friends, your tools, and your cats, and get ready to clean up the world one mess at a time!

short_description: Purrrifiers is a hilarious 4-player co-op game about cleaning while causing chaos. Solve puzzles, drive quirky vehicles, use an array of cleaning tools and team up with adorable cats. Experience absurd humor, diverse locations, and non-stop fun as you collaborate or troll your way to cleaning glory!
